about_the_game:
Separated by Nightmares: Where Duty Dies offers a horror experience that blends first-person puzzle-solving with a deeply woven narrative. Written by the fantasy author behind The Swords of Unforgotten Memories and Worlds Beneath the Shadows, this first chapter introduces you to a workaholic lieutenant who is obsessed with closing every case, driven by a relentless need for answers. His single-minded pursuit cost him his family, yet unknown to most, an even deeper grief haunts him.

When an unexpected blackout engulfs the police station, what begins as a simple power check quickly twists into a haunting quest. Ominous notes from the past start to surface, forcing the lieutenant to confront memories he had desperately tried to bury.

As you guide him through the station’s darkened corridors, you’ll uncover the true source of his torment—and come face-to-face with an unfathomable evil lurking behind the shadows.

Key Features

  • Story-Driven Horror
    Immerse yourself in an unsettling narrative revealed through exploration and cryptic notes.

  • First-Person Perspective
    View the station through the protagonist’s eyes, adding to the sense of presence and tension.

  • Mystery and Discovery
    Investigate hidden clues and unravel the station’s secrets at your own pace.

  • Emotional Depth
    Engage with themes of loss, grief, and guilt, woven naturally into the storyline.

  • Atmospheric Setting
    Venture through a dimly lit police station where disturbing encounters and ominous signs lurk in every corner.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains disturbing imagery, references to drugs and alcohol, strong language, themes of grief and loss, violence.

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later

  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950 or Radeon HD 7970
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
